typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared MoviesDB = let
  AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://perlovskybugbash.dfs.core.windows.net/sample-data/moviesDB.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=******&sp=rwl"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.None]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName))
in
  TrimmedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = MoviesDB,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"Rating"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns", {{"Rotton Tomato", "Rotten Tomato"}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Renamed columns", each ([year] <> "-1980")),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Filtered rows", {"year"}, {{"Count", each Table.RowCount(_), type number}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";
